class_notes: (ONLINE; synchronous live lecture session Tuesdays and synchronous live breakout groups Thursdays)
course_description: Introduction to the theology, history, literature, art, and practice of preaching. This is a foundational class that prepares students for other courses in homiletics. (Introductory Arts of Ministry).
